plot: Kohane Hatoya is a girl who loves to be helpful to others. After she moves from middle school to high school, she becomes fascinated with cheerleading, and she starts a cheerleading club at her high school. Joining Kohane in her cheerleading activities is the experienced Hizume and Kohane's childhood friend Uki. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Jump Up ↑ Yell!!" by Kaminoki Kōkō Cheerleading-bu
ending_theme: "One for All" by Kaminoki Kōkō Cheerleading-bu
insert_song: "Motto Aishiaimasho" (もっと愛しあいましょ) by Yuiko Ōhara (ep 9)
